metadata.title: CVE-2024-27046 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:nfp: flower: handle acti_netdevs allocation failureThe kmalloc_array() in nfp_fl_lag_do_work() will return null, ifthe physical memory has run out. As a result, if we dereferencethe acti_netdevs, the null pointer dereference bugs will happen.This patch adds a check to judge whether allocation failure occurs.If it happens, the delayed work will be rescheduled and try again.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
